This

This site is written mostly in Markdown, compiled by Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. Here’s the source code for this site. The icons were obtained at Material Design Icons, and I’m using system font stacks for sans serif, serif and monospace.

My profile image is the Spy from Team Fortress 2, the greatest hat simulator ever (there’s even an embedded FPS!). One can follow some of my online activity using the links in the footer, including new posts here using the Atom feed.
